sqlMap.select: SELECT USERID, USERNAME, USERGUBUN FROM sy_usermst WHERE USERID = #USERID# AND PASSWORD = #PASSWORD#

select.isEqual: SELECT SYSID, SYSNAME FROM sy_sysmst ORDER BY SORTKEY
SELECT T1.SYSID, T1.SYSNAME FROM sy_sysmst T1, sy_usersystb T2 WHERE 1=1 AND T2.USERID = #USERID# AND T2.AUTH_YN = 'Y' AND T1.SYSID = T2.SYSID ORDER BY T1.SORTKEY

sqlMap.select: SELECT MENUID, MENUNAME FROM sy_menutb WHERE SYSID = #SYSID# AND USEYN = 'Y' ORDER BY SORTKEY

select.isEqual: SELECT MENUID, PGMID, PGMNAME FROM sy_menupgmtb WHERE SYSID = #SYSID# AND USEYN = 'Y' ORDER BY MENUID, SORTKEY

SELECT T2.MENUID, T2.PGMID, T2.PGMNAME FROM (SELECT IN1.* FROM sy_userpgmauthtb IN1 WHERE IN1.USERID = #USERID# AND IN1.SYSID = #SYSID# AND IN1.AUTH_S = 'Y') T1, (SELECT IN2.* FROM sy_menupgmtb IN2 WHERE IN2.SYSID = #SYSID# AND IN2.USEYN = 'Y') T2 WHERE 1=1 AND T1.SYSID = T2.SYSID AND T1.MENUID = T2.MENUID AND T1.PGMID = T2.PGMID ORDER BY T2.MENUID, T2.SORTKEY
